arts.ttl: Liverpool fans are all saying the same thing about Alexis Mac Allister in draw vs Newcastle
arts.sum: Liverpool were held to a 3-3 draw at Newcastle United in a thrilling Premier League encounter on Wednesday night. The Reds fell behind to Alexander...

arts.ttl: 'We all know': Arne Slot admits one Liverpool player was not at his best in the first half vs Newcastle
arts.sum: Liverpool had to settle for a 3-3 draw against Newcastle United at St Jamesâ€™ Park. The Reds have had a flying start to the season....

arts.ttl: 'Potential issue': Eddie Howe admits the one Liverpool substitute who he was very concerned about coming on
Newcastle peg back Liverpool after Salah brace
arts.sum: Premier League leaders Liverpool had their advantage cut to seven points as Fabian Schar's late equaliser earned Newcastle United a thrilling 3-3 draw at St James' Park on Wednesday.

arts.ttl: Newcastle fans love how Anthony Gordon celebrated after scoring against his boyhood club Liverpool just months after being linked with a move back to Merseyside
arts.sum: Gordon found the net in the 62nd minute at St James' Park with a low finish from nine yards after beating Reds defender Joe Gomez with a sharp turn. That goal put Newcastle 2-1 up.

arts.ttl: Howe 'gutted' Newcastle did not win 'great game'
arts.sum: Newcastle boss Eddie Howe says he is "gutted" not to win a "great game" as his side let slip their early lead against Liverpool, before snatching a late equaliser at St James' Park.

arts.ttl: 'Best game of season' - Newcastle give Liverpool rivals hope
arts.sum: Liverpool's 3-3 draw at Newcastle is described as "one of the best games of the season" - and gives their rivals hope in the battle for the Premier League title.

arts.ttl: Arne Slot hails 'special player' Mo Salah and insists Liverpool star was an 'example' to team-mates after scoring twice in enthralling 3-3 Newcastle draw amid questions about his future at the club
arts.sum: LEWIS STEELE AT ST JAMES' PARK: Arne Slot on Wednesday night hailed 'special player' Mohamed Salah as an evergreen star who is always there when Liverpool need him.

arts.ttl: Arne Slot acknowledges â€˜mixed feelingsâ€™ after Liverpool let late lead slip at Newcastle
arts.sum: The Reds were behind twice but also led with only a minute left on the clock

arts.ttl: Arne Slot issues Mo Salah demand and slams Liverpool 'mistakes' in Newcastle draw
arts.sum: Arne Slot saw Liverpool held to a point by Newcastle in one of the games of the Premier League season, with the Reds boss left frustrated that his side threw away a win
